title: How Jordan Peterson Undermines the Subtraction story and leaves the door open for God
description:
The "subtraction story" has likely been a tremendous factor in the loss of faith in the West. I've been working trying to figure out why Jordan Peterson is prompting people to reconsider religion, God, Christianity and the Bible. I think a piece of this is the way he undermines the subtraction story and makes God and faith believable once again for many people. Here I walk through the subtraction story and the ways I think Peterson's ideas can open us up to once again believe in the supernatural.

Maps of Meaning 2017 8 https://youtu.be/Nb5cBkbQpGY 
Maps of Meaning 2017 12 https://youtu.be/6V1eMvGGcXQ?t=0h14m24s 

A Hobbit, A Wardrobe and a Great War https://www.amazon.com/Hobbit-Wardrobe-Great-War-Rediscovered/dp/B01LP2GR08/
